name: WHIZLITE Bot
description: A powerful, multi-purpose WhatsApp bot built with Node.js and Baileys.

PREFIX.description: The prefix your bot will respond to (e.g., . ! # /).

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Your WhatsApp number (without +, e.g., 254712345678). The bot will recognize you as the owner.

OWNER_NAME.description: Your name, which will be displayed in the menu.

BOT_MODE.description: Set the bot's mode. 'public' allows anyone to use it, 'private' restricts it to the owner.

SESSION_ID.description: Your Baileys Session ID. This is MANDATORY for Heroku deployment. Get it from https://whizlitesessions.zone.id

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS.description: Set to 'true' to automatically view contacts' statuses.

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Set to 'true' to automatically react to contacts' statuses.

ENABLE_WELCOME_GOODBYE.description: Master switch for welcome/goodbye messages. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

ENABLE_AUTOREPLY.description: Master switch for auto-reply on mention. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

ENABLE_AUTOREACT.description: Master switch for auto-reaction to keywords. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: (Optional) Your API key from OpenAI for AI features.

REMOVEBG_API_KEY.description: (Optional) Your API key from remove.bg for background removal.

PEXELS_API_KEY.description: (Optional) Your API key from Pexels.com for image search.

DEEPAI_API_KEY.description: (Optional) Your API key from DeepAI.org for AI image effects.
